name: CourseModules
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for creating new module record

Request payload must contain the following fields:

course_id: STRING,
description: STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/courseModules

raw 
  {
    "course_id": "1",
    "title":"CONCLUSION",
    "description": "a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being and not merely the absence of disease and infirmity"
}

Response:

201 - Created 

  {"status":201,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-23T09:55:51.984Z","updated_at":"2022-09-23T09:55:51.984Z","status":"ACTIVE","course_module_id":49,"course_id":"1","title":"CONCLUSION","created_by":40,"updated_by":40}]}
